mapper.update: UPDATE SET state=1 FROM chat WHERE roomnum=#{roomnum} AND addressee=#{sender};
UPDATE SET state=1 FROM closer WHERE roomnum=#{roomnum} AND closermno=#{sender};
mapper.select: SELECT if(count(roomnum)=0,0,roomnum) FROM chatroom WHERE mno=#{mno} AND bno=#{bno};
SELECT count(bno) FROM business WHERE bno=#{bno};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM liked WHERE mno=#{mno} AND bno=#{bno};
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(count(mno),0) FROM liked WHERE bno=#{bno};

when.foreach: UPDATE bsn_laundry SET price=#{laundry.price} WHERE bno=#{bno} AND lno=#{laundry.lno};
UPDATE bsn_schedule SET time=#{schedule.time} WHERE bno=#{bno} AND schno=#{schedule.schno};

mapper.select: SELECT ac.mno, id, password, mname, phone, birth, address, email, mtype FROM account ac, `member` mb WHERE ac.mno=mb.mno AND ac.mno=#{mno};

SELECT ac.mno as mno, bs.bno, id, password, bname, phone, address, email, bz.typenum as bizType, bkno as bankNum, acno as bankAccountNum FROM account ac, business bs, biztype bz WHERE ac.mno=bs.mno AND bs.typeNum=bz.typenum AND ac.mno=#{mno};
mapper.update: UPDATE business SET phone=#{phone},bkno=#{bankNum},acno=#{bankAccountNum}, address=#{address},email=#{email} WHERE mno=#{mno};
mapper.select: SELECT count(rno) FROM reservation res, account ac WHERE res.mno=ac.mno AND stno in ('1','2') AND id=#{id} AND password=#{password};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM account WHERE id=#{id} AND password=#{password};
mapper.select: SELECT ac.mno,bno,mname,b.bname,mtype,id,password FROM (SELECT mno,mtype,id,password FROM account WHERE id=#{id} AND password=#{password}) ac LEFT JOIN `member` m ON m.mno=ac.mno LEFT JOIN business b ON b.mno=ac.mno;
SELECT ac.mno, id, password, mname, email, ac.mtype FROM account ac, `member` mb WHERE ac.mno=mb.mno AND email=#{email};
SELECT count(*) FROM `member` m LEFT JOIN business b on m.mno = b.mno WHERE m.email=#{email} OR b.email=#{email};

SELECT IFNULL(comm,0) count, l.bno, bname, IFNULL(ROUND(eval,1),0) eval, address, phone, likedNum, b.mno FROM business b , liked l LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT count(mno) comm, AVG(grade) eval, bno FROM comments WHERE depth=0 GROUP BY bno) c ON c.bno=l.bno, (SELECT count(mno) likedNum, bno FROM liked GROUP BY bno) lc WHERE l.bno=b.bno AND b.bno=lc.bno AND l.mno=#{mno} GROUP BY b.bno;
SELECT b_l.lno, lname as laundry,price,bname FROM bsn_laundry b_l, laundry_type l_t,business b WHERE b_l.lno=l_t.lno AND b.bno=b_l.bno AND b_l.bno=#{bno};
SELECT eno, cnt, price FROM bsn_equipment WHERE bno= #{bno};
SELECT etcno, price FROM bsn_etc WHERE bno = #{bno};
SELECT bs.schno, time FROM bsn_schedule bs, schedule sc WHERE bs.schno = sc.schno AND bno=#{bno};
SELECT id FROM account ac LEFT JOIN `member` mb on ac.mno=mb.mno LEFT JOIN business bs on ac.mno=bs.mno WHERE (mname=#{name} AND mb.email=#{email}) OR (bname=#{name} AND bs.email=#{email});
SELECT b.email mmail, m.email bmail, id FROM account ac LEFT OUTER JOIN `member` m on ac.mno=m.mno LEFT OUTER JOIN business b on ac.mno=b.mno WHERE ac.id=#{id};
SELECT count(*) FROM account WHERE id=#{id};
SELECT id, mname, bname FROM account a LEFT JOIN `member` m on a.mno=m.mno LEFT JOIN business b on b.mno=a.mno WHERE id=#{id};
